clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison Between Ultra Sound Guided Rectus Sheath Block and Field Block for Midline Hernia Repair
clinical_study.official_title: Ultra Sound Guided Rectus Sheath Block or Field Block for Midline Hernia Repair: A Comparative Study

brief_summary.textblock: Prospective randomized double blinded controlled clinical trial will be done with a total number of 75 patients will be divided into 3 groups. To compare between Ultra-sound guided rectus sheath block VS Field block infiltration in providing a good analgesia for patients undergoing midline hernia repair to detect which one is superior.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: evaluation of postoperative pain in patients immediately after the procedure.
primary_outcome.description: Evaluation of the intensity of postoperative pain using Visual Analogue score for pain.

primary_outcome.measure: Postoperative pain at 2 hours after procedure.
primary_outcome.time_frame: evaluation of postoperative pain in patients at 2 hours after procedure.
primary_outcome.description: Evaluation of the intensity of postoperative pain at 2 hours after procedure using Visual Analogue score for pain.

primary_outcome.measure: Postoperative pain at 6 hours after procedure.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Evaluation of postoperative pain in patients at 6 hours after procedure.
primary_outcome.description: Evaluation of postoperative pain at 6 hours after procedure using Visual Analogue score for pain.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in the level of serum cortisol & catecholamine
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measurement of serum cortisol and catecholamine level 30 minutes before induction of anesthesia , 1 hour after beginning of surgery, 2 and 6 hours after the end of surgery.
secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of cortisol and catecholamine level in blood (nanogram per milliliter) using the ELISA technique

arm_group.description: normal saline will be injected in the rectus sheath
bupivicaine will be injected in the rectus sheath

intervention.description: ultra sound guided injection into the rectus sheath

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Elective midline hernia repair surgery.
2. Age: adult patients between 18 - 60 years old.
3. Gender: Both male and female.
4. ASA Class: I & II.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Refusal of patient.
2. Pregnancy and lactation.
3. Fever or sepsis.
4. Patients ASA III or IV.
5. Addicts and drug abusers.
6. Patients taking corticosteroids or any cardio - active drugs.
7. Local infection at site of the injection.
8. Allergy to any of the study medications.
